entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Rogersville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miramichi 04:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then northeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
